data.name: ben
data.value: On Lake Harriet, there’s a little entryway where we could walk into the lake for a little ice dip. Would you be on board for that?

data.name: leo
data.value: A polar plunge so to speak. I would be down for that. I take a cold shower when I don’t want to have coffee, but need energy.

data.name: ben
data.value: Interesting, have you ever tried just taking a coffee shower?

data.name: leo
data.value: Haha, a shower in-coffee. No, I haven’t.
